description.zh-cn: 东南亚的群岛国家，位于西太平洋。曾先后被西班牙和美国殖民，二战期间被日本占领，于1946年完全独立。
description.en: An archipelagic country in Southeast Asia, located in the western Pacific Ocean. It was colonized by Spain and the United States, occupied by Japan during World War II, and gained full independence in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾政治人物，前总统费迪南德·马科斯之子，于2022年当选为菲律宾总统。
description.en: A Filipino politician, son of former president Ferdinand Marcos, who was elected President of the Philippines in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾政治人物，前总统罗德里戈·杜特尔特之女，于2022年当选为菲律宾副总统。
description.en: A Filipino politician, daughter of former president Rodrigo Duterte, who was elected Vice President of the Philippines in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾政治人物，2016年至2022年担任菲律宾总统，任内发起了大规模的“毒品战争”。
description.en: A Filipino politician who served as the President of the Philippines from 2016 to 2022, known for initiating a large-scale "war on drugs".

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾前总统及独裁者，于1972年宣布戒严，实行独裁统治，后在1986年的人民力量革命中被推翻。
description.en: Former President and dictator of the Philippines who declared martial law in 1972, ruling as a dictator until he was overthrown in the 1986 People Power Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾的国家元首、政府首脑兼武装部队总司令。
description.en: The head of state, head of government, and commander-in-chief of the armed forces of the Philippines.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾的第二高行政官员。
description.en: The second-highest executive official of the Philippines.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，曾对菲律宾进行长达300多年的殖民统治。
description.en: A European country that colonized the Philippines for over 300 years.

nodes.id: 鲁伊·洛佩斯·德比利亚洛沃斯

zh-cn: 鲁伊·洛佩斯·德比利亚洛沃斯

description.zh-cn: 16世纪的西班牙航海家，以当时的西班牙王储费利佩的名字将菲律宾群岛命名为“费利佩群岛”。
description.en: A 16th-century Spanish explorer who named the Philippine archipelago "Las Felipinas" in honor of the then-Prince of Asturias, Philip.

description.zh-cn: 16世纪的西班牙国王，菲律宾国名即以其名字命名。
description.en: A 16th-century King of Spain, after whom the Philippines is named.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾人民为争取民族独立、推翻西班牙殖民统治而进行的革命。
description.en: A revolution by the people of the Philippines to gain independence from Spanish colonial rule.

description.zh-cn: 在菲律宾革命后建立的亚洲第一个共和国，后因美菲战争而瓦解。
description.en: The first republic in Asia, established after the Philippine Revolution, which was later dissolved due to the Philippine-American War.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾革命领袖，菲律宾第一共和国总统。
description.en: A Filipino revolutionary leader and the first president of the First Philippine Republic.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾革命家，领导了反西班牙的起义，但后被埃米利奥·阿奎纳多篡夺领导权并杀害。
description.en: A Filipino revolutionary who led the uprising against Spain, but was later ousted and executed by Emilio Aguinaldo's faction.

description.zh-cn: 在美西战争后取代西班牙成为菲律宾的殖民统治者，直到1946年菲律宾独立。
description.en: Became the colonial ruler of the Philippines after Spain following the Spanish-American War, until Philippine independence in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 美国为确立对菲律宾的殖民统治而发动的战争，导致菲律宾第一共和国瓦解。
description.en: A war initiated by the United States to establish colonial rule over the Philippines, leading to the collapse of the First Philippine Republic.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会通过的一项法案，规范了菲律宾独立的程序，促成了菲律宾自由邦的建立。
description.en: An act passed by the U.S. Congress that established the process for the Philippines to become an independent country, leading to the creation of the Commonwealth of the Philippines.

description.zh-cn: 美国殖民统治下的菲律宾自治政府，是菲律宾独立的过渡时期。
description.en: The administrative body that governed the Philippines during the American colonial period, as a transitional phase to full independence.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间占领菲律宾，并建立了菲律宾第二共和国作为傀儡政权。
description.en: Occupied the Philippines during World War II and established the Second Philippine Republic as a puppet state.

description.zh-cn: 在此期间，大日本帝国占领了菲律宾。
description.en: During this period, the Empire of Japan occupied the Philippines.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，日本在菲律宾建立的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established in the Philippines by Japan during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 美国与菲律宾签署的条约，正式承认菲律宾共和国为独立国家。
description.en: A treaty signed by the United States and the Philippines that formally recognized the Republic of the Philippines as an independent nation.

nodes.id: 费迪南德·马科斯统治下的戒严令

zh-cn: 费迪南德·马科斯统治下的戒严令

description.zh-cn: 1972年，费迪南德·马科斯总统宣布在菲律宾实行戒严，开始其独裁统治，期间伴随着政治压迫和新闻审查。
description.en: In 1972, President Ferdinand Marcos declared martial law in the Philippines, beginning his dictatorial rule characterized by political oppression and press censorship.

description.zh-cn: 一场非暴力群众示威运动，导致独裁者费迪南德·马科斯下台。
description.en: A series of nonviolent mass demonstrations that led to the downfall of dictator Ferdinand Marcos.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾政治人物，已故反对派领袖小贝尼格诺·阿基诺的遗孀。在1986年人民力量革命后成为菲律宾总统。
description.en: A Filipino politician and the widow of assassinated opposition leader Benigno Aquino Jr. She became president of the Philippines after the 1986 People Power Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾反对党领袖，费迪南德·马科斯的头号政敌，于1983年在马尼拉国际机场遇刺身亡。
description.en: A Filipino opposition leader and the chief political rival of Ferdinand Marcos, who was assassinated at Manila International Airport in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾前总统费迪南德·马科斯的妻子，被指控与丈夫共同贪污及挪用巨额公款。
description.en: The wife of former Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos, accused of corruption and embezzling vast sums of public funds with her husband.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾政治人物，柯拉蓉·艾奎诺与小贝尼格诺·阿基诺之子，于2010年至2016年担任菲律宾总统。
description.en: A Filipino politician, son of Corazon Aquino and Benigno Aquino Jr., who served as the President of the Philippines from 2010 to 2016.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾前总统，因腐败指控在2001年的人民力量革命中下台。
description.en: Former President of the Philippines who was ousted in the 2001 People Power Revolution due to corruption allegations.

description.zh-cn: 一场大规模街头抗议活动，导致时任总统约瑟夫·埃斯特拉达下台。
description.en: A series of large-scale street protests that led to the ousting of then-President Joseph Estrada.

nodes.id: 格洛丽亚·马卡帕加尔-阿罗约

zh-cn: 格洛丽亚·马卡帕加尔-阿罗约

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾政治人物，在2001年人民力量革命后接替约瑟夫·埃斯特拉达成为总统。
description.en: A Filipino politician who succeeded Joseph Estrada as president after the 2001 People Power Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由总统罗德里戈·杜特尔特发起的打击贩毒产业的行动，因其法外处决行为而备受争议。
description.en: A campaign against the drug trade initiated by President Rodrigo Duterte, which has been controversial due to its extrajudicial killings.

description.zh-cn: 此次选举中，小费迪南德·马科斯当选为总统，萨拉·杜特尔特当选为副总统。
description.en: In this election, Ferdinand Marcos Jr. was elected president and Sara Duterte was elected vice president.

description.zh-cn: 小费迪南德·马科斯在2022年菲律宾总统选举中获胜，成为菲律宾总统。
description.en: Ferdinand Marcos Jr. won the 2022 Philippine presidential election and became the President of the Philippines.

description.zh-cn: 萨拉·杜特尔特在2022年选举中当选为菲律宾副总统。
description.en: Sara Duterte was elected Vice President of the Philippines in the 2022 election.

description.zh-cn: 萨拉·杜特尔特是罗德里戈·杜特尔特的女儿。
description.en: Sara Duterte is the daughter of Rodrigo Duterte.

description.zh-cn: 小费迪南德·马科斯是费迪南德·马科斯的儿子。
description.en: Ferdinand Marcos Jr. is the son of Ferdinand Marcos.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙于1565年开始对菲律宾群岛进行殖民统治，直至1898年菲律宾宣告独立。
description.en: Spain began its colonial rule over the Philippine Islands in 1565, which lasted until the Philippines declared independence in 1898.

relationships.source: 鲁伊·洛佩斯·德比利亚洛沃斯

description.zh-cn: 西班牙航海家鲁伊·洛佩斯·德比利亚洛沃斯于1542年将该群岛命名为“费利佩群岛”，成为“菲律宾”国名的由来。
description.en: In 1542, Spanish explorer Ruy López de Villalobos named the archipelago "Las Filipinas," which is the origin of the name "Philippines."

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾的国名源于西班牙航海家鲁伊·洛佩斯·德比利亚洛沃斯以当时还是王储的费利佩二世的名字命名。
description.en: The name of the Philippines originated from Spanish explorer Ruy López de Villalobos, who named it after Philip II, who was then the Crown Prince of Spain.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾革命旨在推翻西班牙的殖民统治。
description.en: The Philippine Revolution aimed to overthrow Spanish colonial rule.

description.zh-cn: 在菲律宾革命之后，菲律宾于1898年6月12日宣告独立，建立了菲律宾第一共和国。
description.en: Following the Philippine Revolution, the Philippines declared independence on June 12, 1898, establishing the First Philippine Republic.

description.zh-cn: 在菲律宾革命期间，革命阵营内部发生分裂，埃米利奥·阿奎纳多篡夺了安德烈·滂尼发秀的领导权并将其杀害。
description.en: During the Philippine Revolution, a split occurred within the revolutionary camp, where Emilio Aguinaldo seized leadership from Andrés Bonifacio and had him executed.

description.zh-cn: 美国于1899年2月发动美菲战争入侵菲律宾，导致新生的菲律宾第一共和国瓦解。
description.en: The United States launched the Philippine-American War in February 1899, invading the Philippines and causing the collapse of the nascent First Philippine Republic.

description.zh-cn: 美菲战争导致新生的菲律宾第一共和国瓦解。
description.en: The Philippine-American War led to the collapse of the nascent First Philippine Republic.

description.zh-cn: 美西战争后，美国从西班牙手中获得菲律宾主权，开始对菲律宾进行殖民统治，直到1946年菲律宾完全独立。
description.en: After the Spanish-American War, the United States acquired sovereignty over the Philippines from Spain and began its colonial rule, which lasted until the Philippines gained full independence in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 该法案由美国国会通过，规范了菲律宾独立的程序，促成了1935年菲律宾自由邦的建立。
description.en: This act, passed by the U.S. Congress, established the process for Philippine independence, leading to the creation of the Commonwealth of the Philippines in 1935.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，日本占领菲律宾，中断了菲律宾自由邦的统治。
description.en: During World War II, Japan occupied the Philippines, interrupting the rule of the Commonwealth of the Philippines.

description.zh-cn: 日本占领菲律宾期间，于1943年10月建立了菲律宾第二共和国作为傀儡政权。
description.en: During its occupation of the Philippines, Japan established the Second Philippine Republic in October 1943 as a puppet state.

description.zh-cn: 根据《马尼拉条约》，菲律宾共和国于1946年7月4日完全独立并获得美国承认。
description.en: According to the Treaty of Manila, the Republic of the Philippines became fully independent on July 4, 1946, and was recognized by the United States.

relationships.target: 费迪南德·马科斯统治下的戒严令

description.zh-cn: 为延续其统治，费迪南德·马科斯于1972年下令实行戒严，开始其独裁统治。
description.en: To extend his rule, Ferdinand Marcos ordered the implementation of martial law in 1972, beginning his dictatorial regime.

description.zh-cn: 1986年的人民力量革命导致独裁者费迪南德·马科斯下台并流亡海外。
description.en: The 1986 People Power Revolution led to the ousting of dictator Ferdinand Marcos, who then went into exile.

description.zh-cn: 人民力量革命后，被刺杀的反对派领袖小贝尼格诺·阿基诺的遗孀柯拉蓉·艾奎诺继任总统。
description.en: After the People Power Revolution, Corazon Aquino, the widow of the assassinated opposition leader Benigno Aquino Jr., succeeded to the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 柯拉蓉·艾奎诺是小贝尼格诺·阿基诺的遗孀。
description.en: Corazon Aquino was the widow of Benigno Aquino Jr.

description.zh-cn: 贝尼格诺·阿基诺三世是柯拉蓉·艾奎诺的儿子。
description.en: Benigno Aquino III is the son of Corazon Aquino.

description.zh-cn: 贝尼格诺·阿基诺三世是小贝尼格诺·阿基诺的儿子。
description.en: Benigno Aquino III is the son of Benigno Aquino Jr.

description.zh-cn: 因面临腐败指控，约瑟夫·埃斯特拉达在2001年的人民力量革命中下台。
description.en: Facing corruption allegations, Joseph Estrada was ousted from office during the 2001 People Power Revolution.

relationships.target: 格洛丽亚·马卡帕加尔-阿罗约

description.zh-cn: 在约瑟夫·埃斯特拉达下台后，时任副总统的格洛丽亚·马卡帕加尔-阿罗约接任总统职位。
description.en: After the ousting of Joseph Estrada, then-Vice President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo assumed the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 罗德里戈·杜特尔特总统上任后发起了大规模的打击贩毒产业的“毒品战争”。
description.en: Upon taking office, President Rodrigo Duterte launched a large-scale "war on drugs" to combat the narcotics industry.

description.zh-cn: 小费迪南德·马科斯在2022年菲律宾总统选举中胜选，成为总统。
description.en: Ferdinand Marcos Jr. won the 2022 Philippine presidential election, becoming president.

description.zh-cn: 萨拉·杜特尔特在2022年菲律宾总统选举中获选为副总统。
description.en: Sara Duterte was elected vice president in the 2022 Philippine presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 伊梅尔达·马科斯是费迪南德·马科斯的妻子。
description.en: Imelda Marcos is the wife of Ferdinand Marcos.
